root.name: Itadaki Street DS
root.description: The DS version of the long running Itadaki Street franchise. Players buy property, stock, and earn promotions to reach the top income goal and win the game! Command characters from either the Dragon Quest or Super Mario franchise in Business man supremacy. Or simply create your own character, unlocking gear and other such objects to add on to your character and make him stand out, apart from the roster. Play on your own and master strategies, or get three other friends together and put your newly developed strategies to work! CharactersAs Previously said, Characters in both Dragon Quest and Mario franchise appear in this game:Mario, Luigi, Yoshi, Princess Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario, Princess Daisy, Waluigi, Birdo, Bowser and Toad on the Mario side. Slime, Angelo, Jessica, Pudding, Bianca, Dragonlord, Alena, Kiryl, Yangus (young), Hassan, and Platypunk represent Dragon Quest.
